name: City&Hunter
description:
A non-entry *tears* for A Game By Its Cover 2015

This is what we had by the end of the jam, starting the day before it ended!

A game about shooting while sliding and diving in slow-mo. Get the highest score possible because we didn't have time to make levels! Hurrah.

w - move left

d - move right

shift - slide, crouch, dive, get slow motion if bullets graze

spacebar - jump (twice for double jump)

mouseclick - shoot

r - restart

f - fullscreen
